info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Anderson, southern Pickens and east central Oconee Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Clemson, or near Six Mile, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Easley, Clemson, Anderson, Central, Northlake, Pendleton, Liberty, Norris, Six Mile and Powdersville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
